text:
Hi all, the issue is in the perspective of a search engine or any SEO tool ,
• <https://www.demandcalendar.com/en/contact-us?hsLang=en>
• <https://www.demandcalendar.com/en/contact-us>
when these are used in hreflang tag, these act has totally different links with causes error, HubSpot automatically adds <https://www.demandcalendar.com/en/contact-us> in hreflang tag, but tools like Semrush are detecting <https://www.demandcalendar.com/en/contact-us?hsLang=en> and invoking error. :neutral_face:

Email our team members or fill out the contact form
Like the code is perfect and upto the standards or SEO and search engines but these tools are detecting errors
any thoughts on this?
Hi Ahmed tools such as Screaming Frog usually have the ability to exclude things such as parameters. Example of how to exclude URLs with parameters using Screaming Frog.
